mapper.insert: insert into member(MT_id,member_id, member_passwd,member_jumin, member_name,member_phone,member_postcode,member_address, member_email, member_info, member_infoC) values (#{MTId},#{memberId},#{memberPasswd}, #{memberJumin}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone},#{memberPostcode},#{memberAddress}, #{memberEmail},#{memberInfo},#{memberInfoC})
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_passwd = #{memberPasswd}
